\subsection{Detailed Description}
provides a way to perform timings of how long things take

U\-S\-A\-G\-E E\-X\-A\-M\-P\-L\-E

\$\-T = new benchmark();

\$\-T-\/$>$start(); // ... do whatever that must be timed ... \$\-T-\/$>$stop(); echo \char`\"{}\-Load time took\-: \char`\"{} . \$\-T-\/$>$\hyperlink{class_benchmark_aa836be07a8d7f803a8f6acc965acf2a3}{display()} . \char`\"{}s\char`\"{};
